description:
Getting to Know Bipolar Disorder Symptoms

Whenever someone in the family or a familiar person suddenly acts strange and the behavior can be associated with some kind of mental disorder, it is important that symptoms must be seen and accurately determined to be able to know the kinds of treatment for the disease.

Before claiming that someone really suffers from bipolar disorder, it is first important to identify the symptoms to strengthen the educated guess.

A sudden gush of excitement can‚Äôt be categorized as being bipolar. People have the right to be angry, happy, sad and all those behaviors. Although, when one experiences the disease, it will be most unlikely that the person will show a condition that had become tragically habitual. Typically, there are four episodes that a person will engage into if he or she suffers from the disorder. These episodes are:

1. Major Depressive Episode

Someone who is experiencing a major depressive episode in his or her life expresses symptoms like:

‚Ä¢ persistent emotional feelings of anxiety, anger, sadness, guilt, isolation and hopelessness ‚Ä¢ indifference, apathy or self-loathing ‚Ä¢ appetite and sleep disturbances ‚Ä¢ fatigue and extreme restlessness ‚Ä¢ unable to become interested in usually enjoyable activities ‚Ä¢ depersonalization and extreme loneliness ‚Ä¢ lack of interest in having sexual activities ‚Ä¢ social anxiety and shyness ‚Ä¢ chronic pain that usually triggers irritability ‚Ä¢ suicidal tendencies or morbid thinking

In worst case scenarios, most especially if the person suffering from the disorder never had the opportunity to go into psychological help, he can become psychotic which is also known as a severe condition of the disease.

2. Manic Episode

Major characteristics of people who experiences manic episodes are those that have a distinct condition of expansive, irritable or elevated mood state. Someone who suffers manic episodes experience a common insurmountable amount of energy but lacks the capability to get proper sleep.

Furthermore, the speech of the person is pressured in a way that even thoughts are racing. Attention span is decreased and can be easily distracted. Impairment of judgment can also be experienced whereas the sufferer will undergo sprees and abnormal behavior that is quite unusual on his or her part.

Indulging in substance abuse can also be possible. Substances may include depressant drugs, stimulants, and even sleeping pills. Behavior may range from being intrusive or aggressive. Grandiose and delusional ideas may become prominent. During extremes, a person may exhibit psychosis which is a factor that perceives fantasy more than reality.

3. Hypomanic Episode

This is the lesser part of mania episode. Extremes are less prominent. Symptoms and attitudes are also decreased. When a person experiences a hypomanic episode, he would feel sudden uncontrollable behavior like laughing out loud even with no specific reason behind it or there might be a reason but it would be shallow.

Duration of the episode occurs only for a short period of time. Oftentimes, this is associated with the artistic mind of the person involved because intelligent thinking, flight of ideas, and an abnormal increase in energy can be seen.

4. Mixed Episode

Mixed episodes usually refer to the combined state of depressive episodes and manic episodes that may occur simultaneously. Some of which are experiencing impulsiveness, racing thoughts, rage, agitation, paranoia, aggressiveness, etc.

It is better that one understands the different episodes a bipolar disorder expresses in order to diagnose the disease earlier and treatment can be performed.

description:
Start right now and take an active role in your mental health care. Use My Mental Health Crisis Plan to create your own psychiatric advance directive (also called a PAD) or mental health advance directive.
In just a few minutes, you can put a plan in place to guide your care in case of a mental health crisis.

COMPLETELY SECURE, FREE AND EASY TO USE
CREATE your own personal PAD
CHOOSE who to share your PAD with, such as your family or treatment team
KEEP your PAD with you in the app, no matter where you are
UPDATE and SAVE your PAD any time your preferences change
Includes instructions for making your wishes LEGALLY
WHY YOU SHOULD CREATE A PAD
Take a more active role in your mental health care
Make sure you are better prepared in case of a crisis
Decide who are the contacts you trust to act on your behalf
Share your choices with doctors and others who are part of your care team

DEFINE THE DECISIONS YOU WANT MADE DURING A MENTAL HEALTH CRISIS
Emergency treatments that are acceptable, and those that are not
Medications that work best for you, and those to avoid
Physicians you prefer to handle your care, and who to avoid
Facilities where you would like to receive care, and those where you do not want to go
Who should make decisions on your behalf


My Mental Health Crisis Plan is developed and maintained by SMI Adviser. Learn more at SMIadviser.org/about.
SMI Adviser is funded by the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration (SAMHSA) and administered by the American Psychiatric Association (APA).

description:
Suicidal thoughts can seem like they will last forever ‚Äì but these thoughts and feelings pass with time. Having a plan in place that can help guide you through difficult moments can help you cope and keep you safe. This safety plan is designed so that you can start at the beginning and continue through the steps until you feel safe. 

In this safety plan app, you can customize your own warning signs that a crisis may be developing, coping strategies for dealing with suicidal urges, places for distraction, friends and family members you can reach out to, professionals you can call, methods of making your environment safe, and your own important reasons for living. 

If following your safety plan is not enough to stem a suicidal crisis, then this app also contains an easy-to-access list of emergency resources so that help is just a tap away. 


--

Want more?
This Suicide Safety Plan is one of six components of an application suite called MoodTools. MoodTools aims to create a free, convenient, and easy-to-use Android smartphone application suite that provides empirically-supported tools to combat clinical depression on a large scale. Check out our other apps!

Use Branch Health to help take control of your chronic pain through data, social support, and rewards. Branch Health was created for pain patients by pain patients with input from best-in-class doctors and pain specialists. 

If you live with lower back pain, neck pain, knee pain, migraines, fibromyalgia, CRPS, Crohn's Disease, endometriosis, arthritis, lupus, nerve pain related to sciatica, or more, Branch Health‚Äôs mission is to help you find a way to best self-manage.

The app is easy to use and offers:

- Tracking 
Track your pain. Create your personalized journey by updating your Branch Health profile with your specific pain type or condition. You can record changes to your pain level, medication usage, treatments, mood, sleep patterns, accomplishments, challenges, goals, and more.
Set the privacy levels and share as much or as little as you want. You can now have this information ready to go at appointments with your healthcare team.

description:
What is iCBT?

iCBT is Internet-based Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (iCBT). CBT is effective and commonly used for a variety of mental health concerns. ‚ÄòC‚Äô is for cognitive and refers to what and how we think. ‚ÄòB‚Äô is for behavioral or how we act. Cognitive-Behavioral is about the relationship between our thoughts, emotions, and behaviors.

Those thoughts, emotions, and behaviours connect to our moods, our physical experiences, and events in our lives. Being aware of how negative thoughts about an event or experience might be affecting how we act, or perceive a situation, can change our emotional, behavioural and physical responses to it.

Morneau Shepell‚Äôs AbilitiCBT is CBT delivered by a therapist through an app. Combining a personalized therapist-guided program with digital tools and exercises to bring CBT to life wherever and whenever needed.

Mobile access. Therapy that meets you where you are.

Digital therapy means easy access available 24/7 from any mobile device making it easy to incorporate therapy into your daily life without the additional time and travel requirements of in-person therapy.

Supported by a trained CBT therapist

Every program includes a dedicated CBT therapist who will review all of the work and activities in the program. The therapist will guide the treatment plan accordingly, which may mean suggesting new activities or revisiting modules. The therapist is also available through via messaging to offer feedback and support.

Interactive exercises and activities

Each module contains activities, videos and assignments to help you learn, develop and practice new skills. Activities are seen by your therapist who will review and provide direction and support.

How it works

All programs will start with a clinically validated screening which assesses for depression, anxiety, substance abuse, mania, sleep, and other mental health conditions.

The therapist will review the screening results to create a personalized program.

Each program contains a series of modules that follow an established CBT framework: assessing your current state, education and lessons, skill building, reinforcement and reassessment. The therapist will guide you throughout by reviewing and providing feedback on all exercises and modules. When you are ready the therapist will make the next module available in your program.

description:
\This is my go-to app in the morning and at the end of my day. It's more than a journal it is close to a personal therapist\ ‚Äî Meet Alan Mind, the most loved journaling app. 20k reviews. 4.9 stars.

START FEELING BETTER NOW

If you want to build a healthier and more mindful lifestyle, are facing a difficult or stressful time, want to address any negativity or anxiety in your life, or just want to feel focused and in control: Alan Mind is here to help.

And there's no need to fear the blank page! With interactive guides tailored to improve confidence, gratitude, and focus or address anxiety, loneliness, and goal-setting, Alan Mind makes the benefits of a journaling practice easy and accessible.

Plus everything you enter in Alan Mind is protected for your eyes only, always. All entries are automatically encrypted and each user can set their own encryption key, for maximum security. We do not sell user data or run ads.

RECOMMENDED BY EXPERTS

Journaling is like yoga for the mind. It's a healthy, mindful practice, recommended by therapists, psychologists, and leading professionals (like Oprah Winfrey and Tim Ferriss) to improve mood, health, and productivity.

Through it's guided structure, Alan Mind makes practices used by therapists and CBT experts accessible and interactive. Plus, studies have found that journaling can improve physical and mental health and make you 42% more likely to achieve your goals.

CREATE A PERSONALIZED PRACTICE

Discover quick, daily questions tailored to you, your day, and your mood. Get ready for sleep before bed or for your day ahead in the morning. Or focus on a specific area for growth with a themed, immersive guide.

In Alan Mind's library of interactive guides, you can find step-by-step approaches to:

- Build a mindful lifestyle where you feel present, aware, and in control
- Find peace of mind and calmness before bed to sleep better
- Practice focus and gratitude to wake up and start your day well in the morning
- Learn positive mental habits to address stress, anxiety, and sadness
- Gain perspective and connect with happiness to combat feelings of loneliness
- Master the rewarding, joyful practice of gratitude
- Improve personal confidence and feel more empowered in your life
- Set goals, track progress, and feel focused and productive as you work to achieve them

Plus, you can easily track your personal progress and wellbeing over time, with your in-app profile or by easily adding the Mindful Minutes you spend with Alan Mind to your Apple HealthKit and CareKit.

ALAN MIND PREMIUM

Alan Mind offers an optional, auto-renewing yearly subscription for $59.99 ($5/month billed annually). Alan Mind also offers a free, 7-day trial of the subscription. You will automatically be charged $59.99 after the trial. You can cancel any time, including during your trial.

This price is in US Dollars (USD). Pricing in other currencies and countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

The subscription automatically renews unless turned off in your iTunes Account at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your iTunes account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed.

description:
How to Quit Smoking?
Ready to stop smoking?
This app will help you kick the cigarette habit for good.

We all know the health risks of smoking, but that doesn‚Äôt make it any easier to kick the habit. Whether you‚Äôre an occasional teen smoker or a lifetime pack-a-day smoker, quitting can be really tough.
To successfully stop smoking, you‚Äôll need to address both the addiction and the habits and routines that go along with it. But it can be done. With the right support and quit plan, any smoker can kick the addiction‚Äîeven if you‚Äôve tried and failed multiple times before.

Start your stop smoking plan with START
S = Set a quit date.

Choose a date within the next two weeks, so you have enough time to prepare without losing your motivation to quit. If you mainly smoke at work, quit on the weekend, so you have a few days to adjust to the change.

T = Tell family, friends, and co-workers that you plan to quit.

Let your friends and family in on your plan to quit smoking and tell them you need their support and encouragement to stop. Look for a quit buddy who wants to stop smoking as well. You can help each other get through the rough times.

A = Anticipate and plan for the challenges you‚Äôll face while quitting.

Most people who begin smoking again do so within the first three months. You can help yourself make it through by preparing ahead for common challenges, such as nicotine withdrawal and cigarette cravings.

R = Remove cigarettes and other tobacco products from your home, car, and work.

Throw away all of your cigarettes, lighters, ashtrays, and matches. Wash your clothes and freshen up anything that smells like smoke. Shampoo your car, clean your drapes and carpet, and steam your furniture.

T = Talk to your doctor about getting help to quit.

Your doctor can prescribe medication to help with withdrawal symptoms. If you can‚Äôt see a doctor, you can get many products over the counter at your local pharmacy, including nicotine patches, lozenges, and gum.

description:
No one deserves to live with PTSD, depression or an anxiety disorder. EMDR is an exceptionally effective treatment for these conditions. This app contains everything needed in EMDR therapy, and more, to use whenever and wherever you need it.

OPTIONS
Configure the app to your liking! All features follow the scientific literature on EMDR.
‚Ä¢ 3 configurable speed settings
‚Ä¢ 3 types of stereo sounds
‚Ä¢ 2 kinds of visuals (moving circle, flashes)
‚Ä¢ Auto-stop after a standard ‚Äòdose‚Äô

MULTI-DEVICE OPTIONS
This app is available for iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple TV, and supports Apple Watch and game controllers. Combine multiple devices for additional options:
‚Ä¢ Alternate screen flashes between devices
‚Ä¢ Alternate vibrations between devices

LOCAL CONTROL
Enable the \local control\ feature to control the app on a nearby device:
‚Ä¢ Remote control the start/stop of a session.
‚Ä¢ Change settings remotely.
‚Ä¢ Control multiple devices simultaneously
‚Ä¢ Control devices even outside the trial period.

Check the app‚Äôs Tips section to find the right settings for you.

FULL VERSION
A one-time payment allows you to keep using the app after the 24 hour trial period. This one-time payment unlocks the app on every other available platform as well. With your purchase you are investing in yourself, and in the continued development of this app.

A NOTE ON SELF-HELP
Please note that this app is meant for professional EMDR therapists. This app is NOT a substitute for a therapist! If you're not a therapist and you want to use the app for yourself, for example out of interest or because therapy is not available, inform yourself well on EMDR therapy and proceed with care:
‚Ä¢ Get enough sleep, before and after.
‚Ä¢ Create a safe and comfortable environment.
‚Ä¢ Limit your use, especially in the first few days.

Made in Amsterdam by qualified psychologists.

description:
Want to manage stress or anxiety? Apply the scientifically proven technique of using sounds, lights, and vibrations to stimulate both sides of your brain.

The EMDR Tappers app was designed by researchers, veterans, and licensed eye movement desensitization and reprocessing (EMDR) professionals to replicate EMDR therapy tools with only a smartphone. Users can set the pace of animations, vibrations, and sounds. These stimuli are synchronized to replicate the benefits of EMDR therapy in any setting without the expensive, bulky equipment. Users can also use the app with just a single phone or two phones. All of this for free. No external, annoying ads.

The core of EMDR therapy is bilateral stimulation: alternatively stimulating each side of the brain with sounds, lights, and vibrations. EMDR is a scientifically proven method of dealing with stress, anxiety, and other negative psychological conditions. EMDR is a \strongly recommended\ technique by the leading veterans' organizations, and the American Psychiatric Association has noted that EMDR is effective for treating PTSD symptoms.

description:
PTSD Family Coach is for family members of those living with posttraumatic stress disorder (PTSD). The app provides extensive information about PTSD, how to take care of yourself, how to take care of your relationship with your loved one or with children, and how to help your loved one get the treatment they deserve. The app also provides a great deal of information that is specific to Veterans and active duty members of the military.

Living with a family member who has PTSD can be incredibly stressful, and PTSD Family Coach includes 24 unique tools to help you manage this stress, including mindfulness exercises, tools to help you re-build your social networks, and tools to help with difficult thoughts and emotions you may be experiencing. The app also provides a way for you to track your stress level over time, using scientifically valid measures, and can provide specific feedback about your progress. Finally, PTSD Family Coach offers a number of ways for you, and your loved one, to connect with support.

PTSD Family Coach was created by VA‚Äôs National Center for PTSD and DoD‚Äôs National Center for Telehealth & Technology.

description:
Aivo helps you recover from chronic primary pain with a comprehensive digital program.

Developed by pain researchers and vetted by patient advocates, Aivo is a multidisciplinary chronic pain recovery program delivered in an app. Aivo combines personal coaching, education, community, tools and progress tracking to help you every step of the way.

Assessment

Pain recovery starts with understanding of your pain. In your first week of the program, we'll explore your unique experience with pain and how it has impacted you. This information guides your personalized care plan. You will also have a unique opportunity to discuss your results with a world-renowned pain expert Dr. Melissa Farmer.

Personalized pain relief program

After the assessment, you will receive a personalized pain relief program that meets your unique needs. Our multimodal care plans are continuously optimized based on your data and they cover all areas that are relevant to your pain relief, e.g. pain education, sleep improvement, movement, stress reduction, relief learning and flare management.  

Integrated care team

Your dedicated health coach will actively collaborate with you each day by sharing recommendations, expert information, and personalized support and inspiration. You will be working towards sustainable pain relief with your integrated care team. In addition to pain experts and health coaches, there will be data scientists helping you to find the right treatment combination for you.   

Evidence-based

Our science-based solution for chronic pain relief is based on decades of highly regarded, peer-reviewed brain imaging research conducted by Dr. Vania Apkarian at Northwestern University in Chicago, Illinois. By peering into the brains of people who live with chronic pain, research now shows that chronic pain is a reflection of how the brain works. Our app/clinic combo brings this science directly to people who live with ongoing pain.

Your pain is real. But your pain is NOT your future.

Learn more at: aivohealth.com

description:
Find relief from anxiety, stress, and depression with Feelmo's CBT, DBT, and ACT-inspired self-help process.

Feelmo has been developed in collaboration with leading therapists to help you build emotional resilience and is already helping thousands feel better.

FEELMO HELPS YOU:
‚Ä¢ Understand difficult feelings like insecurity, anger, and fear
‚Ä¢ Find relief from troubling feelings such as anxiety, worry, and uncertainty
‚Ä¢ Get support when feeling lonely, overwhelmed, or burned out
‚Ä¢ Learn about emotional wellbeing and self-care

Take control of your mental health today with Feelmo!

\I love this app! I wasn't sure at first what to expect but it‚Äôs really great! I have a hard time expressing my feelings in an understandable way but since getting Feelmo it‚Äôs been easier to express myself and get to the root of what's going on. I truly recommend it!\ -Serenity

UNDERSTANDING AND MANAGING YOUR FEELINGS
We believe you are capable of managing your mental health with the right guidance and tools: that‚Äôs why we made Feelmo!

Ask any therapist and they'll tell you how important it is to understand your feelings.

Feelmo's intuitive emotions explorer and personalized therapy-inspired questions help you label and validate your feelings so you can understand what's going on for you.

Our Manage recommendations are tailored to you and include suggested coping strategies for different feelings, inspirational quotes as well as self-care recommendations.

RECOMMENDED BY THERAPISTS
Understanding your feelings is the first step to feeling better. That is why Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Dialectical Behavior Therapy (DBT) and Acceptance and Commitment Therapy (ACT) therapists, psychologists and counselors are recommending Feelmo.

\As a clinician, I assist many of my clients with developing skills around identifying their emotions and increasing their comfort with feeling their emotions, and Feelmo is the perfect way to support clients in practicing these skills in-between sessions. I find Feelmo to be incredibly accessible, intuitive, and beneficial to my clients struggling with stress, anxiety or mild depression.\ -Feelmo Clinical Co-Founder Dr. Larisa Cicila

HOW DOES FEELMO WORK?
Feelmo's three-step process was developed together with therapists to help you build emotional resilience and self-efficacy.

The process is based on helping you better identify, understand, and manage your feelings.

1. IDENTIFY: Identify the precise words to describe your feelings
Our intuitive emotions Explorer makes finding the precise words to describe your feelings simple.

2. UNDERSTAND: Discover the meanings behind your feelings
Feelmo's clinically informed Reflect activities help you explore your feelings and uncover the messages they're trying to tell you.

3. MANAGE: Learn how to manage your feelings
Feelmo's wide variety of coping tools and suggestions adapt to your needs and provide temporary relief, like breathing exercises, or long term solutions, whatever the situation requires!

FEELMO CAN HELP
We believe that you are capable of feeling better and managing your mental health but maybe, like all of us, you need a little guidance and support to reach your goals:

‚Ä¢ Improving Your Self-Awareness
‚Ä¢ Developing Emotional Management Skills
‚Ä¢ Enhancing your Quality of Life and Sense of Wellbeing

Feelmo teaches you what you need to feel better and supports you along the way.

DOWNLOAD FREE TODAY
Download now and join the thousands of Feelmovers already using Feelmo to build emotional resilience and find relief from stress, anxiety, and depression!

SAY HELLO!
We love hearing from you! Reach out and share your thoughts, feelings, questions, feedback, or simply say hello:

Email: hello@feelmo.com
Instagram / Facebook / Twitter: @feelmoapp

WE RESPECT YOUR PRIVACY
Your data is yours: we will not share it with anyone else. Read more about our Terms of Service (www.feelmo.com/termsofserviceios) and Privacy Policy (www.feelmo.com/privacypolicyios)

Clear your mind and relax with a unique audio-visual meditation experience.

Mesmerize combines engaging visuals with relaxing music and expertly crafted guided meditations to give you an all encompassing meditation experience.

BENEFITS

‚Ä¢ Lower Anxiety
‚Ä¢ Better Sleep
‚Ä¢ Overcome Depression
‚Ä¢ Enhance Self-Awareness
‚Ä¢ Deeper Relaxation
‚Ä¢ Reduce Pain

‚Ä¢ In fact, there are many more proven benefits to meditation. The impact of a consistent meditation practice can have a profound impact on the overall quality of your life.

FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Engaging Visuals; uniquely hypnotic visuals designed to mesmerize you. Control their speed with a pinch gesture.
‚Ä¢ Soothing Psycho-Acoustic Music; designed based on clinically validated principles to ease your body into a state of relaxation.
‚Ä¢ Guided Meditations & Hypnosis; expertly crafted to help you on a range of topics.
‚Ä¢ Nature Sounds and White Noise; including rain, ocean, thunder, train, fan and much more

‚Ä¢ Visual Breathing; the speed of visuals will automatically adjust to your selected breathing pattern.
‚Ä¢ 3D Voice
‚Ä¢ Narration speed control
‚Ä¢ Audio Fusion; mix outside audio with Mesmerize playback.
‚Ä¢ Sleep Timer; set Mesmerize to automatically stop after a period of time.
‚Ä¢ Variable Volumes; control the voice and music volumes separately to get your perfect balance between the two.
‚Ä¢ Offline Compatible; download your favorite content to listen later in airplane mode.
‚Ä¢ Random Modes; don't like choosing? Automatically chose a random from your favorites or a particular content category.

‚Ä¢ Privacy Focused; no ads, no marketing emails, no logins or passwords, no accounts, no crazy permissions. In the age of information intrusion, Mesmerize is specifically designed to leave you alone.

MEDITATION & HYPNOSIS TOPICS

SCIENCE
Interested in learning the science behind Visual Meditation? You can learn more at www.MesmerizeApp.com/Science

SUBSCRIPTION AND TERMS
When you download Mesmerize you can opt into a 7-day free trial to test out the product. If you do not see a free trial available to you, it's likely because you have already tried the product previously. If you'd like another trial please email us at support@mesmerizeapp.com.

Your Mesmerize subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term and payment will be charged through your google account. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your google account settings but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

As with all of our apps, if you would like to use Mesmerize but have trouble affording it please email us at support@mesmerizeapp.com so we can help you with our financial assistance program.

While we can't keep bringing great experiences to the world without making money, we know not everyone that needs access to our content can afford it, and we're happy to help.

Safety Warning: we present content that may not be appropriate for people with a history of seizures or epilepsy. Additionally do not use while driving, operating heavy machinery, or any settings where your full attention is required. Viewer discretion is advised.

Sleep Reset is a life-long solution to improve sleep and reduce sleep anxiety with the most effective methods from top-tier sleep clinics, including strategies based on Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Insomnia (CBT-I) ‚Äì available for the first time in a convenient mobile app.

Join thousands who are using the Sleep Reset program to fall asleep faster, sleep through the night, get deeper sleep, and wake up refreshed ‚Äì for a happier, healthier, and more productive life.

WHY SLEEP RESET?

CONVENIENT AND ACCESSIBLE

description:
Quit Drinking ‚Äì Stay Sober helps you to stop drinking alcohol. It contains many inspirational features that help you to stay away from alcohol and stay sober. You just need to provide quit drinking date and time, money spent weekly, & drinks per week and you will get sober statistics. You will get daily notifications about how much time you have been sober.

Are you tired of feeling controlled by alcohol and ready to take control of your life and quit drinking? This comprehensive guide is here to empower you and provide you with the tools and resources you need to achieve long-term sobriety and build a sober lifestyle.

The guide begins by delving into the causes of alcohol dependence and the impact it has on both the individual and their loved ones. It then covers the different methods for quitting drinking, including detoxification, therapy, support groups and medication-assisted treatment. It also covers the important steps that should be taken to prepare for quitting drinking, such as setting realistic goals, creating a support system, and making a plan to manage triggers and cravings.

Once the initial process of quitting drinking is complete, the guide shifts its focus to maintaining sobriety and building a sober lifestyle. It provides tips and strategies for coping with the emotional and psychological challenges of early sobriety, such as dealing with feelings of isolation, depression, and anxiety. It also offers practical advice on how to rebuild relationships and repair the damage caused by alcohol addiction.

The guide also covers the importance of self-care and self-improvement in maintaining sobriety and how to set and achieve goals for personal growth and development. It also provides information about the different types of support available for maintaining sobriety, such as therapy, support groups, and sober living communities.

Isolation can fuel alcohol addiction, but joining a supportive and non-judgmental community of individuals also on the road to recovery can help. The first step towards quit drinking is to take action and keep in mind that you are not alone in this journey. Start your addiction recovery process by putting down the alcohol and drugs.

This guide is a must-read for anyone who is ready to take the first step toward quitting drinking and achieving long-term sobriety. With its comprehensive and practical approach, it will provide you with the knowledge and tools you need to overcome alcohol addiction and build a happy and healthy sober lifestyle.

Quit Drinking ‚Äì Stay Sober App Features:
> Statistics: The app shows sober statistics like the time you have been sober, the money you have saved from not drinking alcohol, life regained, & the number of drinks not drunk.
> Quit drinking reasons: You can add reasons for quitting alcohol. So, whenever you have the urge to drink alcohol, read these reasons and feel strongly about your quitting alcohol decision.
> Treats: You can add treats, and can purchase from the money you have saved from quitting drinking.
> Health Stats: It shows how your body and health improve as long you have been sober. It also shows the progress of your body and health improvement. You can also share your health improvement to your friends or family.
> Tips to quit drinking: There are some tips given that help you to quit drinking and stay motivated.
> Trophies / Badges: You can achieve trophies on Sober time, money save, life regained and a number of drinks not drunk.

Sobriety counter for all addictions - Track more addictions and get access to more recovery communities. Even if your addiction is specific like Wine, alcohol, or Beer, you‚Äôll find a variety of communities of people who are all trying to get sober from alcohol, drinking, drugs, smoking, eating disorders, self-harm, and more.

Use Quit Drinking ‚Äì Stay Sober and Take firm determination to quit drinking right now. Stay Sober and Stay Motivated!!

description:
Get to better sleep with personalized sleep coaching and education. Zen Sleep helps you improve sleep by using the principles of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Insomnia (CBT-I), the most proven and long-lasting solution recommended by sleep physicians for various sleep problems.

Unlike other sleep apps, Zen Sleep goes beyond just your sleep metrics and numbers. Through our proprietary questionnaire, we help identify your key sleep problems and create personalized daily routines to guide you towards better sleep hygiene. Whether you‚Äôre suffering from mild sleep problems or severe insomnia, we can help guide you to better sleep! 

FEATURES

Questionnaire:
Our proprietary questionnaire is developed with our licensed sleep physician, mirroring the same questions a sleep doctor would ask. These will help us identify your key sleep problems and habits.

Daily Routines & Reminders:
From our questionnaire, we will craft a personalized plan for you to get to better sleep hygiene. From waking up, exercising, cutting out caffeine, to winding down for bedtime, we will remind you with our seamless notifications.

Sleep Issues:
Get customized insights into your unique sleep problems and how to improve on them. From caffeine and alcohol intake to napping and sleeping in on weekends, we have you covered on things you may not have known before.

Sleep Challenge:
Why pay a sleep coach hundreds of dollars when we can put you through the same sleep reset program? Join us in your first 6-week challenge to get to better sleep!

description:
The Virtual Hope Box (VHB) is a smartphone application designed for use by patients and their behavioral health providers as an accessory to treatment.  The VHB contains simple tools to help patients with coping, relaxation, distraction, and positive thinking.  Patients and providers can work together to personalize the VHB content on the patient's own smartphone according to the patient's specific needs.  The patient can then use the VHB away from clinic, continuing to add or change content as needed.


Patients can use the VHB to store a variety of rich multimedia content that they find personally supportive in times of need.  For example, a patient can include family photos, videos and recorded messages from loved ones, inspirational quotes, music they find especially soothing, reminders of previous successes, positive life experiences and future aspirations, and affirmations of their worth in their VHB.  A patient can also collaborate with their provider to create coping cards to use in response to personal problem areas they experience.  Finally, the VHB provides the patient with positive activity planning, distraction tools, and interactive relaxation exercises including guided imagery, controlled breathing and muscle relaxation.

description:
\The Safe Place\ Is a Minority Mental Health App geared towards the Black Community. African Americans are 20% more likely to experience serious mental health problems than the rest of the general population. However, many  black people still do not wish to seek professional help for their mental illnesses.

The Purpose of the \Safe Place\ is to bring more awareness, education, and hope to this serious  issue. Not only can the black community benefit from this app, but also mental health professionals, friends, and family, of ALL colors can be better educated on this issue and do a service by directing their black friends, co workers, etc. to the app. 

All races go through mental illness, but we also can experience it differently because of our race and social backgrounds.  \The Safe Place\ can also be a great learning tool for mental health professional's to better understand their black patients.

App features Include 

* Black Mental Health Statistics

*Inspirational Black Quotes

*Self Care Tips On

1. How to Cope After Police Brutality

2. Mental Health In The Black Church 

3. How to talk to black family members who may not want to understand mental illness

4. Breathing Techniques 

5. Meditation 

6. Exercise

*Mental Health Videos And Podcast

*Mental Health Articles 

*Open Fourm Discussions

And More!

description:
Welcome to the *realest* way to drink less. 

Finally! There‚Äôs a truly effective way to change your relationship with alcohol that won‚Äôt bore you to tears (and takes less than 10 minutes a day). Whether you‚Äôre ~sober curious~, keen to cut-back or quit alcohol altogether, Lived is the app for you. 

Whatever your goals, we‚Äôve got just the right real-life advice and tools to get you there ‚Äî delivered by a line-up of relatable humans who‚Äôve been there themselves.

Your relationship with alcohol and any changes you want to make are going to be 100% unique and entirely personal. So why would you want some stuffy, one-size-fits-all program to put you in a box? With Lived you‚Äôll get the support you need and answers you can actually relate to.

Work through what‚Äôs holding you back with ‚ÄòCourses‚Äô and ‚ÄòMoments‚Äô, which will guide you on everything from getting started to managing those pesky cravings (in minutes). Get uplifted, build your confidence and steer your day in the right way with our ‚ÄòDaily Boost‚Äô and ‚ÄòIntention Setter‚Äô. Stay on track with Lived‚Äôs free ‚ÄòDrinks Tracker‚Äô, which lets you set your own personal goals (and even add your count from previous trackers seamlessly!). Plus, celebrate your inevitable wins with instant sharing on social media or private messages.

The best part? It actually works. Peer-to-peer style support is proven to be the most effective method for long-term change with alcohol. So not only is our app a good vibe, safe and inclusive, it‚Äôs also one of the most effective. Over 80% of people surveyed using Lived reported positive progress in their first 4 weeks.

It‚Äôs always completely free to sign-up and instantly access a whole world of awesome tools, Lived Guides and support. It‚Äôs time to drink less and live more!


WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL GET:
   ‚Ä¢ Community of Lived Guides who get it
   ‚Ä¢ Library of Courses on the stuff you actually want to know
   ‚Ä¢ Free customizable Drinks Tracker
   ‚Ä¢ Moments: instant support for over 25 unique triggers and cravings
   ‚Ä¢ Fresh inspiration with Daily Boosts (new ones every day)
   ‚Ä¢ Free Intention Setter and tracking
   ‚Ä¢ Instantly share your wins on social media or private messages
   ‚Ä¢ Custom reminders for yourself to check in when you want
   ‚Ä¢ The most proven methods for long-term change with alcohol



Completely free to sign-up. Start living your best life from today.

Premium Subscriptions coming soon‚Ä¶

description:
Tired of years of Yo-Yo dieting?
MEAL is your source to mindful eating or intuitive eating, the most sustainable approach to nutrition, weight loss and self-care. 

MEAL doesn't offer any workout plans or diets like most weight loss apps, we teach women to eat healthy and address the root causes of overeating, binge and emotional eating. We also stand for a non-restrictive approach to food, as restrictions develop various eating disorders.

MEAL main principles are:
- rejecting diet mentality
- mental and physical health are the main priority
- nutrition without restrictions
- reconnecting with natural body signals
- every body is beautiful

In MEAL app you‚Äôll find:

- theoretical and practical sessions with certified psychologists and nutritionists
- guided sessions of mindful eating (i.e. intuitive eating)
- handouts with balanced plate constructor
- articles about mindfulness and awareness
- inspiring content to keep you motivated;
- quizzes and questionnaires about your eating behavior
- Apple Health app integration to personalize your journey in accordance with your cycle and activity
- personal insights based on your answers and many more

You can use MEAL for free, the free includes basic tips and advice to start eating mindfully. To get the complete functionality of MEAL you'll need to buy a subscription that includes 7 free days to get an impression of what we offer. With the paid version you'll enjoy the individual guided journey to new eating habits, which includes handouts, check yourself quizzes, guided mindful eating sessions, extended expert advice, and much more.

MEAL app is based on Harvard Medical School research, and we partner with certified nutritionists and therapists.

Curated by licensed dietitians, nutrition coaches and Cognitive Behavioral therapists (CBT), MEAL not only breaks down nutrition in a digestible way but also guides you to release any emotional blockages you have surrounding food, so you understand the what, where, how, and why of what you eat.

While it‚Äôs a long-term solution that can‚Äôt be taught overnight, you‚Äôll start building awareness and mindfulness skills from day one. With our professional psychology & healthy nutrition coaches you‚Äôll learn to:
- eat when you‚Äôre hungry and stop when you‚Äôre satiated
- enjoy all foods without guilt and overeating
- understand how to build a balanced plate
- address emotional eating and binge eating
- stay body positive no matter what
- practice intuitive eating and mindful living
- lose weight sustainably


Terms of Use: https://mindful-eating.app/terms-and-conditions-of-use

EULA: https://mindful-eating.app/eula

Join the community of contemporary women taking back control of their eating habits today!

description:
Quit Drinking ‚Äì Stay Sober helps you to stop drinking alcohol. It contains many inspirational features that helps you to stay away from alcohol and stay sober.

You just need to provide quit drinking date and time, money spent weekly, & drinks per week and you will get sober statistics. You will get daily notifications about how much time you have been sober.

Quit Drinking ‚Äì Stay Sober App Features: 
* Statistics : App shows sober statistics like time you have been sober, money you have saved from not drinking alcohol, life regained, & number of drinks not drunk.

* Diary Note : You can add diary note to record your number of urges for drink and your mood during the day, and short description / note about whole day.

* Quit drinking reasons : You can add reasons for quitting alcohol. So, whenever you have urge to drink alcohol, read these reasons and feel strong toward your quitting alcohol decision.

* Treats : You can add treats, and can purchase from money you have saved from quit drinking.

* Health Stats : It shows how your body and health improves as long you have been sober. It also shows progress of your body and health improvement. You can also share your health improvement to your friends or family.

* Tips to quit drinking : There are some tips given that helps you to quit drinking and stay motivated.

* Trophies / Badges : You can achieve trophies on Sober time, money save, life regained and number of drinks not drunk. 

We hope that our app helps you to quit drinking, stay sober and make your life and family happier. 

Use Quit Drinking ‚Äì Stay Sober and Take firm determination to quit drinking right now. Stay Sober and Stay Motivated!!

description:
Do you smoke or do your friends smoke?  Everyday thousands of teens throughout the world get hooked on tobacco. Whether you are a smoker wanting to quit or a non-smoker who would like to find out more, Tobacco Free Teens has something for everyone.

These are some of the topics covered:

‚Ä¢Dangerous chemicals in tobacco smoke
‚Ä¢Five steps that will help you quit smoking
‚Ä¢How teens are targeted by big tobacco companies
‚Ä¢The real cost of smoking cigarettes
‚Ä¢Myths about smoking
‚Ä¢How Hollywood movies may influence you to smoke
‚Ä¢Dangers of secondhand smoke
‚Ä¢How to refuse a cigarette
‚Ä¢Reasons that people start to smoke
‚Ä¢How to handle stress so you can quit for good

These and many other topics are introduced in a fun and easy-to-read comic style.  Several mini-games and activities are included to entertain and inform the user.

Tobacco Free Teens is a product of the Tobacco Education Program (TOEP) directed by Alex Prokhorov, MD, PhD, Professor of Behavioral Science.  TOEP is funded by the Tobacco Settlement Funds provided to The University of Texas MD Anderson Cancer Center, Houston, TX.

The App Store‚Äôs first crisis plan management app for mental health emergencies: with built-in crisis plan tools, emergency resources, coping skills, and virtual grounding box

-Designed to help you deal with any suicidal or mental health crisis, Anemone allows you to create your customized crisis plan, including important information like early symptoms, crisis signs, emergency contacts, medications, treatment facilities, and more

-View your crisis plan at any time on your phone or export or share it to friends, family, and even law enforcement

-Connect to local hospitals, phone lines, and resources with just one click with Emergency Resource buttons

-Flip through cards to view some of the most trusted, psychiatrist-approved coping skills to use in any emergency, such as Grounding, Mindfulness, and Diversion

With Anemone, you control your own crisis management plan and support system. Even in the darkest times, you can rely on your plan to get you through an emergency. This app will help you through the most difficult times in your life. 

Remember, your information is completely confidential and private. All information is stored locally on the app and is only available to you.

Make this space your own by filling it with thoughts, ideas, worries, concerns, feelings, hopes and dreams. Use it knowing that anything you don‚Äôt want to keep inside your mind - HOLD will hold it for you.

Often people cannot engage properly with things that are on their mind because it might be hard or confusing, it may take the time they don‚Äôt have or it may seem like a waste of time. Talking with yourself in HOLD helps you release your thoughts in a clear and productive way and without fear of judgment. You can always return to these conversations later with a fresh perspective so you can continue to progress even if you have little time in your life. 

HOLD guides you into learning self-reflection in an easy and accessible way, encouraging you to develop your personal practice of self-reflection and maintain useful and healthy thought processes. Get to the core of what is on your mind and discover your own patterns. 


WHAT YOU CAN DO WITHHOLD: 

- Have a conversation with yourself, to help you explore your thoughts
- Let out what‚Äôs on your mind by speaking or writing
- Everything is stored so you don‚Äôt forget anything unless you delete it
- Log your mood for each conversation with yourself and keep track of how it changes
- Read and listen back to your thoughts to reflect more clearly
- Use the Tools to deepen your self-reflections 
- Create collections of conversations to better understand your own patterns
- Gradually learn self-reflection techniques 
- Set up reminders and build your own self-reflection routine 

KEY BENEFITS: 

- Clear your mind
- Think more clearly and listen to yourself
- Talk about things without worrying about what you are sharing and with who
- Reduce stress and anxiety 
- Don‚Äôt forget things that are important to you - hold yourself to account
- Learn how to self-reflect with structure 
- Potentially Improve your mental wellbeing and overall happiness
- Feel more in control of your life


WHY SELF-REFLECTION?

Self-reflection is a unique function of the human mind that occurs naturally; it allows you to consider and respond to what you think, feel and do. 

HOLD has been developed by combining classical psychological theories and contemporary self-reflection research with today‚Äôs cutting-edge technologies. It allows you to create your own self-reflection space that grows with you.

HOLD helps you have semi-structured conversations with yourself and equips you with tools and techniques which can positively expand your thinking, instead of feeling limited by stress and anxiety.

As you master the stages in HOLD you will develop your self-reflection practice, stimulating deeper thinking and a greater understanding of yourself, helping you to feel empowered and in control of who you are and what you are doing in life.

With HOLD you can take time to talk, reflect and learn about yourself. We value your privacy, so we ensure that all the information you enter in the app will only be stored on your phone and never shared with anyone.


Take hold of your thoughts and improve your mental wellbeing. Reduce anxiety and stress by taking control of what is on your mind. 

Download HOLD now for free, no sign-up required.

description:
There is something in all of us that responds involuntarily to different stressors and the complexity of life which is suggested be the fundamental problem of all mental illnesses. It grows and thrives as a consequence, goes beyond tolerance, making our lives miserable. Lives are complicated and we cannot stay on top of our problems all the time. People are just being hammered in many ways and that lead to their collapse in the direction of their genetic susceptibility and biological weakness.

The CBT app is developed as a tool for introspection and will provide you with evidence-based information about emotional problems and mental disorders. It will teach you cognitive behavioural therapy and other self-help methods, and techniques, specifically designed to help with overcoming depression, generalized anxiety and worry, social anxiety and shyness, divorce and separation, loss and bereavement. It will help you test yourself, identify your problems and bring order in your life by tackling your negative thoughts and habits.

The CBT app provides practices, examples, and exercises that will help you assess and understand the roots of your worries and teach you how to suppress your negative thinking. Cognitive behavioural therapy is proven to be effective in the long term by applying the techniques and shift the way you think. It can help you find a meaning and purpose, negotiate with yourself and be free from your past. 

‚ÄúSuch as are your habitual thoughts, such also will be the character of your mind;
For the soul is dyed by the thoughts.‚Äù Marcus Aurelius

‚Ä¢	In the Depression section, you will learn more about psychological, medical and alternative treatments for relief, reduction, prevention and dealing with major depressive disorders, dysthymia, bipolar disorder. By using the self-help methods you can learn helpful ways of thinking, that will help overcome depression now and in the future. It will also help you to practice ways of living your life and relating to people that leave you less vulnerable to depression.

‚Ä¢	In the Anxiety and Worry (GAD) section you will have the opportunity to learn more about anxiety and worry and whether you are a worrier. A helpful set of strategies will show you how to deal with the purpose, meaning, and content of your worries. And, at the end, you will have a different perspective on how to manage it. The program will help you tackle your mental habits, address your feelings and practice different behaviors.

‚Ä¢	In the Social Anxiety section, you will have the opportunity to learn more about social anxiety and how to overcome shyness, reassess your predictions about how things turn out for you and challenge the way you interpret others' responses to you. This program will teach you practical attention strategies to decrease your self-consciousness, social exposure exercises, and some social communication tips.

‚Ä¢	In the Divorce and Separation section, you will learn about specific coping skills practices and training and helpful general practical advice. Along the way, it is worth remembering that the process of recovery from separation and divorce takes time, sometimes a long time. Rather than judge yourself for not going fast enough, it is important to give yourself credit for any small steps you make to help yourself or your children adjust to the changes.

‚Ä¢	In the Bereavement and Loss section, you'll find information about grief and loss, including what is actually happening when we experience grief, common emotional reactions to loss, and unhelpful myths and expectations about grief. Although it's not possible to turn back the clock or remove the fact of a loss, you may find some of these ideas are useful for helping with your grief.

*The app is not designed to treat clinical levels of depression or anxiety, or other mental health disorders. Further counseling is needed as the diagnosis and treatment require a medical practitioner or a qualified mental health professional.

description:
Easeday is designed to help you reduce the frequency and impact of your headaches, TMJ (jaw/facial pain), and migraine attacks. It offers an extensive collection of engaging information and clinically-validated therapeutic exercises.  Relaxation training, education, lifestyle modification, trigger management, sleep hygiene, and other non-pharmaceutical modalities can improve health and well-being for those experiencing migraine attacks. With as little as 10 minutes of relaxation training a day, Ease has been shown to decrease monthly headache and migraine days by up to 60%, but as with physical exercise, any amount you do will help.



You will learn about causes of headaches and migraines, common triggers, available treatment options, tips & tricks for avoiding attacks, and what to do when you feel an attack coming. Ease also guides you through a recommended series of informative educational sessions and therapeutic exercises. The goal is to incorporate Ease into your daily routine as part of a personalized pain management plan.


Another important Easeday feature is HRVY. HRVY is Easeday‚Äôs heart rate variability (HRV) sensing feature to measure your resilience to stress. HRV has become the most scientifically accepted way to follow your relaxation response in real time. Watch your HRV score increase as you practice therapeutic breathing exercises.  Over weeks and months, you can see your HRV scores improve with regular Easeday relaxation training. 


The higher the HRV score the better. Higher HRV scores correlate with increased resilience to stress, improved cardiovascular health and a longer life span.  Lower HRV scores correlate with decreased resilience to stress, chronic pain, and depression. For good reason, health-conscious people today are incorporating a daily relaxation exercise into their personal wellness strategy to complement their physical conditioning routine. 


In addition, Easeday provides an easy-to-use headache diary for tracking headache and migraine events. You can record symptoms, triggers, medication usage, and the impact on your life.

You will also receive personalized guidance and insights to help identify patterns and changes that you can make to reduce the chance of having a future headache or migraine attack. You will be able to see your progress and improvement over time, learn what triggers may affect you the most, and see how you are keeping up with your daily goals and training.


Relaxation exercises include:


*Breathing
*Meditation
*Mindfulness
*Sleep
*Progressive Muscle Relaxation
*Guided Imagery
*Autogenics
*Music
*And more


You will find information on:


*Headache and migraine disorders
*Preventative treatments
*Acute treatments
*Rescue plans
*Complementary treatments
*Insomnia
*Chronic Pain
*Fatigue
*Anxiety
*Tinnitus
*Facial Pain (TMJ Syndrome)
*Neck & back pain
*Dizziness
*And many other related conditions


The Ease app integrates with the Health App.

Remember to always seek a doctor‚Äôs advice in addition to using this app and before making any medical decisions

Subscription pricing and terms:


Ease offers an auto-renewing subscription at $9.99/month or $59.99/year to provide you with unlimited access to the Ease library while you maintain an active subscription.


Payment will be charged to the credit card connected to your iTunes Account when you confirm the initial subscription purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be identified. You may manage your subscription and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after the purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription, where applicable.

Use your auditory, visual and kinesthetic senses for a perfect meditation and relaxation session. 

Improve focus, get to sleep faster, reduce stress, meditate better. Guided sessions, sleep sessions, visual based meditations, sounds, music, quotes, it‚Äôs all here. Whether you have only 2 minutes or 30 Fluid will help you relax by grasping your key senses, in a way that can be felt as soon as you use it. 


The meditation app market is quite crowded but after playing around and stumbling upon the concept we just had to bring this to the masses. Our goal ? To do our best to make your day a bit better and you happier. 

- Visual Meditation : You will find something strangely soothing and pleasing about watching and directing the fluid. One of your biggest senses will be taken in focus rather than be forced to shut down, this is perfect especially if you‚Äôre just starting out with meditations. On top of that, just give it to a child and you will see them enthralled, they love it. Use up to 5 fingers to draw patterns as you‚Äôre guided by the music to wind down and relax.

- Guided Sessions : get a guided meditation or listen to a story with high quality audio, soothing music that will either help you relax or get to sleep and stay asleep. (We will be adding more of these as we go)
- Sleep Sounds : play your favorite noises and sounds with or without background music, mix multiple of them and enjoy the calmness.
- Quotes : a section to soak up some wonderful quotes, after a meditation you can jump in and relax as the music and visuals continue.
- Roam, enjoy the fluid flow ? Simply open this section up and enjoy creating patterns and relaxing without having to do anything else.


Fluid is free but also offers Premium subscription packages:
Starting:
Monthly - $1.99
Yearly $15.99

Prices shown are in U.S. Dollars and may vary, depending on location. Prices may be shown in your local currency in the app or the equivalent in U.S. dollars 

The payments are regular Apple in-app subscriptions.

Subscriptions are used to unlock all Premium/Pro
features of the app for as long as the subscription is valid, without limitations.
Payment will be charged to iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, with the price of the chosen subscription package . The subscription auto renews unless it is turned off at least 24h before the end of the current subscription. Subscriptions may be managed from your Account Settings and auto renewal may also be turned off by going to your iTunes account settings after the purchase at anytime.Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited upon purchase of a subscription.

appName: My Pain Diary & Symptom Tracker: Gold Edition
description:
This is the successor the the popular, award-winning, best selling, doctor recommended pain tracking app, My Pain Diary: Chronic Pain & Symptom Tracker.

This version, My Pain Diary: GOLD EDITION, strikes a delicate balance between ease-of-use and a broad feature-set. This is a truly USEFUL app, and the newest member of the My Pain Diary family, which has helped over 90,000 chronic pain sufferers better manage their pain, improve communication with their doctors, and gain insights that would be hard attain through other means.

Useful and popular features include automatic weather fetching, iCloud sync, basic medication tracking, photo attachments, graphs and PDF doctor's reports.

This app is highly customizable. Everyone tracks pain differently, and this is a framework that supports just about any tracking strategy.

Created by a chronic pain patient to track, manage, and report on chronic pain and symptoms, chronic illness, and mental health.

That means there is no big company with deep pockets supporting this project. I am just one man with a chronic pain condition, a demanding day job, and a young family to care for. I just happen to be formally trained in design, self-taught in programming, experienced at marketing and customer relations, and am a chronic pain patient myself. That's a very rare combination of traits that is hard to come by, so I'm making the most of it, and holding my own against the big players.

Enough about me, back to the app!

Features:
+   iCloud Sync Support
+   Universal App
+   Highly Customizable
+   Easy to use 
+   Track unlimited conditions
+   Track multiple/unlimited times per day
+   Add past entries (change entry timestamp)
+   Edit past entries

ANATOMY OF A PAIN DIARY ENTRY

TRACKERS: Trackers can be thought of as labels or folders that categorize and differentiate your entries. These are the key to tracking more than one condition and comparing conditions to each other.

A common strategy is to name the Trackers after the diseases/conditions that you will be tracking. I.e. Migraines, Anxiety, Fibromyalgia, etc. These are just examples. 

METRICS: Each entry is composed of one or more optional pieces of information called 'Metrics'. For example, two commonly used metrics are 'Pain Intensity' and 'Pain Duration'. Metrics are associated with and shared amongst your Trackers. This means that you can set it up to use different metrics for different Trackers, keeping your entry pages clean and the cognitive load low.

 -- MEDICATION TRACKING --
+   Basic medication tracking.

 -- IMPORTANT EVENTS --
+   Record important events that aren't suited for a Pain Diary entry. i.e. Medical Procedures, Therapy Sessions, A slip and fall, etc.

 -- HISTORY --
+    Color-Coded Calendar - Spot patterns and trends at a glance. Calendar days are colored based on the day's highest recorded Intensity.
+   Fully searchable.
+   Day View

 -- GRAPHS --
+   Visualize and compare intensity over time with this interactive graph. Plot and compare up to 3 'Trackables' at once and one optional Weather Metric.
+   Email, print and share a PDF of the Graph.

 -- REPORTS --
+   Create a PDF Report for your Doctors or for archival purposes. Share the Report via email and other standard methods.
+   Include Graph
+   Include Pain Scale Descriptions
+   Include Color-Coded-Calendar
+   Include Medication Log
+   Include Important Events

 -- TOOLS --
+   Automatic Weather Fetching
+   Pain Scale Editor
+   Units preference - US/Imperial or XUS/Metric


Want to see the app in action? Check out the Getting Started video on my YouTube page. www.youtube.com/mypaindiary

appName: The Zone: Daily Self Care & Gr
description:
The Zone is a home for your thoughts, emotions & mental health. üòá

HEAR IT FROM OUR COMMUNITY

\So far, i love it!! it's the best journaling app that doesn't make you buy subscription!\n
\Thank you for this app because of your app I'm feeling relaxed and happy. Really the best UI for journaling I've ever seen. Im grateful for finding this app üòä\n
\ For an app that released less than a month ago, it is absolutely incredible. I've tried probably around a hundred journal apps over the past two years, and this is by far the best one.\n
START FEELING BETTER NOW

If you want to build a healthier and more mindful lifestyle, are facing a difficult or stressful time, want to address any negativity or anxiety in your life, or just want to feel focused and in control: The Zone is here to help.

And there's no need to fear the blank page! With interactive guides tailored to improve confidence, gratitude, and focus or address anxiety, loneliness, and goal-setting, The Zone makes the benefits of a journaling practice easy and accessible.

Plus everything you enter in The Zone is protected for your eyes only, always. All entries are automatically encrypted and each user can set their own encryption key, for maximum security. We do not sell user data or run ads.

RECOMMENDED BY EXPERTS

Journaling is like yoga for the mind. It's a healthy, mindful practice, recommended by therapists, psychologists, and leading professionals (like Oprah Winfrey and Tim Ferriss) to improve mood, health, and productivity.

Through its guided structure, The Zone makes practices used by therapists and CBT experts accessible and interactive. Plus, studies have found that journaling can improve physical and mental health and make you 42% more likely to achieve your goals.

FEATURES 

We believe that journaling is the best medium for the creative expression of our feelings. Our team talked to thousands of people about their journaling practice and found out that everyone has their own unique way of doing it!

Discover new ways to journal with The Zone!

- Free Writing - Write About Anything!
- Writing Prompts - Navigate Through Life with our guided questions!
- Goal Setting - Set Smart Goals.
- Avo-CAN-do - Manage and externalize your feelings with our cute & illustrative card therapy.
- Sleep Stories - Keep track of your subconscious mind.
- Visualization - Make better & more well informed decisions.
- More formats coming soon! Do let us know if you have something in mind :)

Some awesome features made possible by our machine learning based platform:

- Keep track of your overall mood over time
- Be more well-informed emotions that you may have experienced throughout the day
- Keep track of relevant keywords that matter to you over a period of time
- Keep track of the people that you interact with in your daily life.

The Zone is encrypted using Advanced Encryption Standard (AES). Further secure it using the TouchID or PIN features. üîí

HELP US IMPROVE THE APP

The Zone is built by a community of journal and self-reflection enthusiasts.

Please sound out if you have any feedback or recommendations and we will be more than happy to talk to you!

- Send us an email - hello@getthezone.app
- Follow us on Instagram - @thezoneapp
- Join our Telegram Community - https://t.me/joinchat/AAAAAEt2s4wn2qMSA4gLnQ
- Website: https://getthezone.app
- Privacy: https://www.notion.so/Privacy-Policy-256579b73d8344beb1a6a87584a2a331

We look forward to helping you feel your best.

Download now, and get into the zone!

Note:
We foresee the app to be FREE for as long as possible - and we hope that it can be free forever! We do this in our spare time because of that as we need to earn a living wage in this capitalistic society. If you love the app and want to encourage us to keep adding updates to it, please feel free to drop us an email of encouragement, or leave a glowing review as that would really motivate us :)

Most importantly, leave a review so that more people can use it!

description:
It‚Äôs finally here! We‚Äôve been working tirelessly to get the Moment app ready to change the lives of parents around the globe, and bring Maternal Mental Health into the mainstream. 

Our app has been developed alongside leading clinicians and healthcare professionals to ensure it‚Äôs a top service for new parents like you. 

We‚Äôre incredibly excited to be on this parenting journey with you. Together, we can normalise Maternal Mental Health and #MakeItMainstream.

Here‚Äôs what the app can do for you, and a quick how-to-use-it guide. 

What The Moment App Does:
The Moment Health app is for new and expectant mums and their families. 

Our app is committed to making maternal mental health mainstream. Research shows that through early intervention, parents suffering perinatal depression and associated anxieties have an 80-90 per cent chance of recovery.

That‚Äôs exactly why we‚Äôre harnessing the positive power of technology with an app that screens for prenatal and postnatal depression and associated anxieties, through the following innovative features:

CHECKER 
Our early intervention symptoms checker can be used to detect signs of prenatal and postnatal depression and associated anxieties.

It‚Äôs an easy-to-use, evidence-based series of quick questions, used by GPs, clinicians and other healthcare providers the world over to screen for early signs of  prenatal and postnatal depression and associated anxieties.

TRACKER 
The tracker allows you to quickly record your emotions and moods from pregnancy right through to early parenthood. 

It provides a Weekly Mood Report, which shows at a glance how you‚Äôve been feeling over the last days, weeks and months. 

With the Tracker, any emotional changes that could potentially lead to a negative impact on your wellbeing can be picked up and treated very early on. 

COMMUNITY 
The Moment Health community is made up of likeminded parents like you. 

The four major focuses for the community are to provide (1) Connectedness, (2) Support, (3) Companionship, and (4) Advice for our members.

Our community provides a space for our members to share openly and react with empathy in a safe and supportive environment.

LOCATOR 
Through our location tool, mums and dads can find exactly the kind of support and resources they need that are close and convenient to them. 

The location tool recommends centres and groups in close proximity to you, based on where you are and what kind of support you need.

description:
SRM is an effective method of treatment Emotional disorder (Depression and Bipolar disorder).

SRM is a method which notice to keep regular routine makes to keep remission state of Emotional disorder (Depression and Bipolar disorder).


In SRM, you plan the from 5 (simple edition) to 17 (in-depth edition) actions which becomes a daily life's point .

And you record those time and stimulation (0: case of you're alone, +3: case of you had exciting time with many people) you acted.

And you record the day's feeling at the end of one day.


SRMLogger's main function is below.

-The definition which is planning to action

- record daily stimulation, feeling and carried out time of each action

-Graphical representation of a change in feeling


Each data of action plans and a carried out log's record are preserved on the cloud, so even if you change the smart phone, it's possible to continue and keep using it.


If you start app, please define action plans on the Plan screen first.

Next, tap the Log screen and record carried out log - tap each action and input carried out time and stimulation(+3 ~ 0).

At the end of one day, record feeling(-5 ~ +5). -. You can change a target date to recording carried out log.

You also can confirm the change in feeling by a chart on the Graph screen. Please utilize such as to show your condition to your doctor easily.

description:
Want to check and monitor mental health? Need a mood tracker app to track feelings and improve your well being, and better manage stress? ‚ù§Ô∏è
 
üÜì  Try uMore for FREE & build coping skills against mental health problems and improve overall wellbeing.

‚û° An app built by scientists üî¨ and psychologists so you can learn about your emotional well being using our unique depression, anxiety, and stress detector app. Your mental health companion also comes with well being index, mood chart, and feelings tracker that supports you in managing your mental health daily.

UMORE GIVES YOU MORE:
‚úÖ  Instant well-being index and stress check
‚úÖ  Daily mood tracking with a simple feelings journal tracker and stress management
‚úÖ  Insights and activities on your symptoms and behaviors 
‚úÖ  Better manage your mental health and identify patterns to figure out what works for you
‚úÖ  Control of your well being journey

ABOUT THE UMORE MENTAL HEALTH APP
uMore is award-winning monitoring, self-help and self-management mental health app that helps you better manage stress, anxiety, and depression. You can use the app by itself for prevention or self help, or as a part of treatment.

1Ô∏è‚É£  INSTANT ASSESSMENT OF YOUR EMOTIONAL HEALTH
You can self-manage and track or share your information with a trusted person. uMore is here to help you better manage and to take control of your mental health with our advanced mental health trackers.
Just answer our short questionnaire on your well being to monitor and measure your self-reported level of stress, anxiety and depression. uMore gives you a clinically validated score. With the well being score, you can see how your scores change and understand your triggers and general mental well-being.

2Ô∏è‚É£  CHECK-IN DAILY AND TRACK YOUR MOOD
Check-in daily using the mood diary tracker and see your mood over time in your trend calendar. Use our mood log feature as a happiness tracker, bad mood journal, feelings journal, and emotion tracker to analyze your moods and see what triggers your good and bad days. Tracking your mood daily helps you feel more in control and gives you a sense of closure to feel better and improve your mental health.

3Ô∏è‚É£  CUSTOM INSIGHTS AND TAILOR-MADE EXERCISES
We know that overcoming depression or anxiety is not easy. Even stress management is a challenge. That‚Äôs why our feelings tracker, mood calendar, and stress management app give you custom evidence-based recommendations to calm your mind. Expert medical advisors make everything on the app with proven interventions such as CBT and mindfulness, all designed to improve your self-care and well-being.

You can self-manage symptoms and related problems by taking part in our weekly activities.

‚úÖ Download uMore ‚Äì your daily journal and mood diary, anxiety & stress level checker, tracker, depression and mental wellness app!

---

THE UMORE MISSION

We‚Äôre on a mission to destigmatize mental health. We wish to make it accessible, regardless of income or location. We‚Äôre combining innovative technology, machine learning, and medical research to make uMore the most helpful app for tracking, analyzing, and helping you stay on top of your mental wellbeing.

IMPORTANT
uMore is a risk class I medical product according to the Council Directive 93/42/EEC Appendix IX.3 rule 12. We declare that the uMore monitoring and self-management application meets the provisions of Annex VII of the Council Directive 93/42/EEC for medical devices. Our EU declaration of conformity is issued under the sole responsibility of the manufacturer.

DISCLAIMER
uMore explicitly does not replace the diagnosis by a mental health care provider but can only give orientation on whether to consult a mental health care provider who then can include the results of the medical device in diagnostic processes. The app explicitly does not replace psychotherapy.

http://umore.app/
info@umore.app
Instagram ‚á® @umoreaiapp
Twitter ‚á® @uMoreAi

description:
Quit Tobacco is an app that contains much more than the simple title can reflect. It is a motivating program that will encourage you to quit smoking, and continue moving in the right direction. 
Whether you are that have tried to quit before but failed, or this is your first attempt to quit and take back control of your life, Quit Tobacco will help you achieve your goal and adopt a healthy lifestyle. 
After deciding to quit tobacco the first 2 weeks is always the most difficult period, this app helps motivate and keep you on course during this period, and forever thereafter. After entering your data regarding your habit smoking, the app uses this information to show you the health benefits that occur within your body in relation to being smoke free.
Quit Tobacco makes it clear to see the benefits after stopping the habit by showing you your statisitics. Know exactly how much time and money you have saved since quitting. How many cigarettes you have avoided. Knowing this information serves as a great incentive to keep going and remain smoke free.
We understand that people are usually inclined to put away hard decisions. Whether you have decided to quit now or in the future, the motivator alarm serves to notify you daily with motivational quotes before and during the time you have quit.  The featured motivation section within Quit Tobacco is there to give you useful knowledge and techniques to help stop you from relapsing. There are tutorials on meditation, Neuro Linguistic Programming and a variety of topics to educate yourself and stand a better chance of staying on track.
Features:
Health - shows what happens to your body without tobacco
Statistics - shows time since quit 
                 - shows time wasted from smoking
                 - shows life gained (or time saved)
                 - shows money saved from cigarettes
                 - shows avoided cigarettes, tar, nicotine and carbon monoxide
	
Motivation ‚Äì informative articles with useful methods and techniques to help you quit your habit of smoking
Motivator Alarm ‚Äì notifies you at your desired time with a daily motivational quote

description:
PE Coach is designed to be used during therapy for posttraumatic stress disorder (PTSD) with a health professional who is trained in Prolonged Exposure (PE) therapy. The app will guide you through the exercises assigned by your therapist and allows you to track and record your progress. In addition, the app provides techniques such as controlled breathing that will help you tolerate and decrease your distress. PE Coach will help you remember and track your upcoming therapy sessions. You will be able to audio record your sessions directly onto your phone so you can review them later as part of your treatment.

By itself this app is not sufficient to treat PTSD. However, those who are receiving PE treatment can work together with their therapist to use the tools in this app.

PE Coach was created by VA‚Äôs National Center for PTSD.
